data.message:
| I'M AN UP & COMING RAPPER.   HUSH HARDING™ | 

Looking for people to give my music a chance and give this a thumbs up. Ive been doing my own videos , graphics , mixing , and promoting for a long time, i had to start a new channel. So I'm trying to reach new fans. 

TO ANYBODY WHO SUBSCRIBES OR THUMBS UP THANK YOU!  - SORRY I HAVE TO RESORT TO SPAMMING.

replies.message: Hey ill check it out im always looking for new music and artist to listen to .If i like it ill share it around i also run a music group Called Music it has around 35 to 40 thousand members u can share it there if u want .
